    • Introduction to IVI026

    IVI026

    IVI026 is a platform for open-source economic analysis of rheumatoid arthritis (RA) therapies. The R package provides a set of functions for simulating health and economic outcomes for RA patients using an individual patient simulation (IPS) approach.

    Installation

    IVI026 can be installed from GitHub using devtools:

    install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("InnovationValueInitiative/IVI026")

    It can then be loaded into R:

    library(IVI026)

    Model description

    A description of the model is available here.
